title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Intentional Learning for Computer-Mediated Interaction and Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design two or more projects to solve mathematical problems using digital collaboration tools
Learners can analyze communication patterns occurring in computer-mediated interactions and incorporate them into instructional design
Learners can improve mathematical thinking and collaboration skills by over 20% through qualitative evaluation of project outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
